There are no purchases available. Please integrate the Register Library into your app if you haven\'t done so already.
There is no config file. Please push playbillingtester.json file to sdcard/, restart the app, and accept file permissions.
Import your configuration file from the local storage of the phone. This populates the data fields within the main screen.
